articles.title: Venus: The trouble with sending people there - Phys.org

articles.title: Stargazers capture Jupiter, its 4 moons in rare closest date with Earth -  Argus News
articles.description: Stargazers across the world were left mesmerised when they caught the closest glimpse of the giant gas planet with its four moons -- some lucky souls saw it with just binoculars.
